oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Excerpt 20 from oral history interview with Kenneth L. Roberts, 2006 July 27
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An excerpt from an oral history interview with Nashville business and civic leader Kenneth L. Roberts, conducted on 27 July 2006 by Cabot Pyle as part of the Nashville Public Library's Nashville Business Leaders Oral History Project: The Turner Interviews. Roberts discusses the importance of business, the free enterprise system, and non-profit organizations and how they are all necessary--business and free enterprise are necessary for making a living, while non-profits are necessary for making a life. The complete interview, as well as an index, is available in the repository.
